Attributes.description: Data acquisition, time and frequency domain analysis, analog and discrete filter design, sampling theory, time-dependent processing, linear prediction, random signals, biomedical system modelling, and stability analysis; introduction to nonlinear systems.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: All of ELEC 371, ELEC 341, ELEC 221 and one of CPSC 260, CPSC 259 and one of STAT 251, MATH 318, MATH 302, STAT 302.
